EmailTemplate.name: 15 days remainder of construction stage
EmailTemplate.subject: Remainder
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi, Dear Recovery Manager, This is the remainder of the planned date of construction Milestone is About To come 15 days from now, Following are details: Project Name - {!Project_Construction_Stages__c.Project__c} Tower Name - {!Project_Construction_Stages__c.Tower__c} So please consider the same. Thanks- Solitaire
